MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH62 postcode area of Eastham, affecting properties in Delamere Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:19PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repair required. Our team are also working in conjunction with the emergency services and we are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:54pm on 9th January
